DataElement.preferredName: Germline Variation RB1 Gene Mutation Present Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator to whether a germline variation RB1 gene mutation was present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Germline Variation RB1 Gene Mutation Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any mutation that appears in the gametes and which will therefore be transmitted to the progeny with some frequency.:A change in the nucleotide sequence of the RB1 gene._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any detectable and heritable alteration in the lineage of germ cells. Mutations in these cells (i.e., "generative" cells ancestral to the gametes) are transmitted to progeny while those in somatic cells are not.

Concepts.definition: Any mutation that appears in the gametes and which will therefore be transmitted to the progeny with some frequency.

Property.preferredDefinition: A change in the nucleotide sequence of the RB1 gene._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A change in the nucleotide sequence of the RB1 gene.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Abnormalities that occur in human cells and tissues and models of human cancer.

DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2022.8.30 Created for ticket request CADSR0001468. ak 2022.9.28 Released per closed ticket. ak
